N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4500.4 - Procedures

State Regulations
(a) To the greatest
extent possible, the procedures described in this Part shall be incorporated
into other procedures that provide for comment at a public hearing on actions
such as major amendments of the development plan. When a hearing on a major
amendment to the development plan is required by laws, statutes or regulations
other than this Part, that hearing may be combined with the hearing required
under this Part, and a single hearing may satisfy the requirements of both this

Part and such other laws, statutes or regulations (such as the State

Environmental Quality Review Act and the regulations promulgated
thereunder). (b) Prior to the
adoption by RIOC of a major amendment of the development plan, there shall be a
public hearing at a suitable location on Roosevelt Island selected by RIOC, at
which residents of Roosevelt island shall be afforded an opportunity to speak
(subject to such reasonable time limits as RIOC or the person presiding at such
hearing shall establish) and submit written comments on the proposed amendment
of the development plan. One or more representatives of RIOC shall be present
at such public hearing. (c) Notice
of such public hearing shall be published at least 14 calendar days prior to
such hearing in the Roosevelt Island Wire (or such other newspaper circulated
on Roosevelt Island as RIOC may designate). Notes
